front.title: Media Gateway Control Protocol (MGCP) Call Flows

abstract.t: The Media Gateway Control Protocol (MGCP) organizes the communicationbetween a Media Gateway controller, or call agent, and a Media Gateway,e.g. a Voice over IP gateway or a Network Access Server. MGCP isdefined in a companion document [1]. This document provides example ofMGCP usage by providing a variety of call flows, in the case oftelephony and network access servers.
